name: Crazy Delicious Turkey Meatloaf
author: Mary Smith
summary: I created this on a cold day when I didn't want to go to the store. I came up with this using just what I had in the house. With only 3 ingredients it couldn't be easier. You can also make mini loaves or meatballs with this recipe.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) package frozen mixed red, yellow, and green bell pepper strips, thawed and drained
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Cover a baking sheet with aluminum foil
Spray foil with nonstick cooking spray
Puree peppers in a blender until smooth; pour into a bowl
Add turkey and bread crumbs to bowl; mix
Form the turkey mixture into a loaf and place on the prepared baking sheet
Bake in preheated oven until no longer pink in the center, 45 to 60 minutes
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 160 degrees F (70 degrees C)
